Image by London Recordings

Despite this characteristically melancholy state of mind, there exists some positives to be taken from this. Maybe I am, even now.

Iâ€™m also excited to see what happens at our by-elections next week and Iâ€™m excited to see how people rise to the challenge of filling the enormous boots left behind. The answer to all of these somewhat odd questions is probably not, but Iâ€™m excited to see people try and live up to these Nouse legends in their own ways.

Saying all these individuals are irreplaceable and then instantly replacing half of them seems weird and the definition of bitter-sweet. Regardless we must go on.
